snippet: San Bernardino County on Tuesday approved paying a $650,000 settlement to avoid a lawsuit by a man whose beating by deputies after a horse chase was captured on video and led to a federal civil rights inquiry.
abstract: San Bernadino County, Calif, approves $650,000 settlement for Francis Pusok, who was beaten by police officers after car and horse chase in April.
lead_paragraph: San Bernardino County on Tuesday approved paying a $650,000 settlement to avoid a lawsuit by a man whose beating by deputies after a horse chase was captured on video and led to a federal civil rights inquiry.

headline.main: California: County Approves Settlement for Man Beaten After a Horse Chase
headline.print_headline: California: County Approves Settlement for Man Beaten After a Horse Chase
